meta.title: FRTBIO - Customized Cell Culture Expert
meta.description: Founded in 2015, Shenzhen FRTBIO Medical Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise specializing in biomedical R&D, technology introduction, and related services. With a forward-looking vision, the company focuses on laboratory consumables, diagnostic reagents, and advanced international technologies. We provide high-quality fetal bovine serum, growth factors, serum-free media, and preclinical testing services for hospitals, medical institutes, and biopharmaceutical companies nationwide.

slider.s1:
Trusted by Laboratories
Customized Cell Culture Expert
slider.s2:
High Standard Specifications • Benchmarking Global Leading Brands
Dual Origins (New Zealand / Domestic) • Sourced from World-class Ranches
slider.s3:
Serving 200+ Laboratories
Largest Serum Importer in South China

cta.title: Global Excellence, Full-Line Empowerment
cta.desc: Premium dual-origin sourcing from New Zealand / Australia and disease-free regions in China provides top-quality assurance. Essential for laboratory breakthroughs — new cell culture media, assay kits, and custom consumables are continuously launching! Contact us for special offers!

cards.title: Source Control
cards.desc: Selected from disease-free ranches, all origins undergo qualification review and on-site inspection.

cards.title: International Certifications
cards.desc: Products comply with ISIA standards and are certified under ISO 9001 and ISO 13485.

cards.title: Multiple Testing & Evaluation
cards.desc: ① COA required before shipment; ② Two rounds of strict testing and evaluation by overseas and domestic laboratories before import.

cards.title: Biological Efficacy Verification
cards.desc: Validated through cell proliferation rate, colony formation, and other performance assays.

cards.title: Comprehensive After-Sales Service
cards.desc: Continuously approved by Shenzhen Customs as a qualified biological material importer; product traceability strictly monitored, and quality issues are fully refundable or replaceable.

about.title: About FRTBIO
about.desc: Founded in 2015, Shenzhen FRTBIO Medical Co., Ltd. is a high-tech company specializing in biomedical R&D, the introduction of advanced technologies, and comprehensive services. With a dual focus on research and introduction, FRTBIO strategically deploys cutting-edge laboratory consumables and diagnostic reagent technologies worldwide. We provide high-quality fetal bovine serum, growth factors, serum-free media, and preclinical testing services to hospitals, medical schools, and biopharmaceutical enterprises across China.
